name: Tri-Unity Pentacube Axiom
intent: Assemble all δ–Φ–Π–μ–ψ interactions into a single 5D commutative pentacube.
domain: All Boxes equipped with δ, Φ, Π, μ, ψ and their weighted-modal compositions.
axiom: For every 2D face spanned by any pair A,B ∈ {δ, Φ, Π, μ, ψ}, the corresponding ψμ-weighted compositions commute in normal form.
Every 3D δ–Φ–Π slice with μ,ψ-lifts is a valid Tri-Unity+ψ+μ cube.
There exists a unique global normal form NF\_PENTA\_TU for any expression built from δ, Φ, Π, μ, ψ and the meta-operators.
constraints: μ acts as a multiplicative weight on edges and compositions.
ψ acts functorially on morphisms and preserves commutative faces up to NF\_PENTA\_TU.
All local normal forms (NF\_δΦ, NF\_ΦΠ, NF\_δΠ, NF\_δ⊕Φ, ...) embed consistently into NF\_PENTA\_TU.
